poemsDataJson.list_full: 見(み)せばやな 雄島(をじま)の海人(あま)の 袖(そで)だにも 濡(ぬ)れにぞ濡(ぬ)れし 色(いろ)は変(か)はらず
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Let me show him these!//Even the fishermen's sleeves//On Ojima's shores,//Though wet through and wet again,//Do not so change their colors.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Mise baya na|Ojima no ama no|Sode dani mo|Nure ni zo nureshi|Iro wa kawarazu
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ぬれにそぬれし いろはかはらす
poemsDataJson.author: 殷富門院大輔(いんぷもんいんのたいふ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 相手のつれなさを嘆き、つらさを訴える恋の心情
